item.title: 騒乱の火種となったマフサ・アミニの死を報じたとして、イランから「外国勢力と共謀した」と非難されたエラヘ・モハマディの裁判が、月曜日から始まった（ロイター）
item.description:
Reuters:
The trial of Elaheh Mohammadi, accused of “colluding with foreign powers” by Iran for reporting on Mahsa Amini, whose death sparked unrest, began on Monday  —  An Iranian journalist went of trial behind closed doors on Monday on charges linked to her coverage of the funeral …

item.title: 南極大陸の科学研究を伝える、アメリカ政府出資の南極大陸最大・最長寿の新聞「Antarctic Sun」を見てみる（Ben Mack/Esquire）
item.description:
Ben Mack / Esquire:
A look at the US government-funded Antarctic Sun, Antarctica's biggest and longest-running newspaper, which covers scientific research on the continent  —  Meet the one-person team behind Antarctica's longest-running newspaper, the Antarctic Sun.  —  The whipping wind wasn't letting up in the Allan Hills.

item.title: 情報筋の話：FTの編集者Roula Khalafは、元ガーディアンのコラムニストNick Cohenによる不要な誘惑の疑惑に関する記事を、「FTの記事」ではないとして消した（Jane Bradley/New York Times）。
item.description:
Jane Bradley / New York Times:
Sources: FT editor Roula Khalaf killed a story on allegations of unwanted advances by ex-Guardian columnist Nick Cohen, saying the story was not an “FT story”  —  Seven women say that a star columnist groped them or made unwanted sexual advances.

item.title: JioCinema、5月29日のIPL決勝で33M以上の視聴者を獲得し、Hotstarの25.3Mを超え、ライブストリーミングイベントへの同時視聴数の世界記録を更新（Manish Singh/TechCrunch）
item.description:
Manish Singh / TechCrunch:
JioCinema breaks the global record for the most concurrent views to a live-streamed event with 33M+ viewers for the May 29 IPL final, surpassing Hotstar's 25.3M  —  India's JioCinema broke the global record for the most concurrent views to a live streamed event on Monday …

item.title: Twitterが右寄りのコンテンツの本拠地となれば、共和党は、モデレーションを許容しすぎると主張する230条に対する怒りを再考する必要があるだろう（Robby Soave/Reason）。
item.description:
Robby Soave / Reason:
If Twitter becomes a home for right-leaning content, Republicans will have to rethink their ire toward Section 230, which they argue allows too much moderation  —  Twitter is in the midst of a transformation: It is becoming a right-leaning news platform.  This will have profound consequences …

item.title: YouTubeのCEOであるNeal Mohan氏のプロフィール。危険な動画や誤解を招く動画の取り締まりを行う一方で、広告事業と購読事業を強化したと評価されている（Miles Kruppa/Wall Street Journal）。
item.description:
Miles Kruppa / Wall Street Journal:
A profile of YouTube CEO Neal Mohan, credited with bulking up its ad and subscription businesses while seeking to crack down on dangerous and misleading videos  —  Neal Mohan goofs around with creators and woos advertisers to the platform's short videos and TV offerings

item.title: FTの編集者は、ニュースルームには、データのマイニング、コンテンツの分析、要約などの作業を支援するために、AIを責任を持って実験するチームを設けると述べている（Roula Khalaf/Financial Times）。
item.description:
Roula Khalaf / Financial Times:
The FT's editor says the newsroom will have a team to experiment responsibly with AI to help with tasks like mining data, analyzing content, and summarizing  —  Our journalism will continue to be reported, written and edited by humans who are the best in their fields

item.title: 英国のメディア業界団体の連合が、保守党の2023年10月の党大会への参加費（£137/journalist）に異議を唱える声明を発表（Vanessa Thorpe/The Guardian）。
item.description:
Vanessa Thorpe / The Guardian:
A coalition of UK media industry bodies issues a statement challenging the Conservative party's £137/journalist fee to attend its October 2023 party conference  —  UK Conservatives are only party to charge press delegates for accreditation at annual gathering

item.title: Globalによると、Emily Maitlis, Jon Sopel, Lewis Goodalの日刊ポッドキャスト「The News Agents」は2023年5月に30Mダウンロードされ、米国の週刊ポッドキャストは6月20日にデビュー（William Turvill/Press Gazette）。
item.description:
William Turvill / Press Gazette:
Global says Emily Maitlis, Jon Sopel, and Lewis Goodal's daily podcast The News Agents had 30M downloads in May 2023; their US weekly podcast debuts on June 20  —  The News Agents announced on Thursday they would launch a new weekly US podcast.  —  The executive producer of the News Agents …

item.title: Viacom18、インドのJioCinemaにNBCUniversalの映画やテレビ番組を導入する複数年契約を締結、有料会員専用コンテンツにする予定（Manish Singh/TechCrunch）
item.description:
Manish Singh / TechCrunch:
Viacom18 signs a multiyear deal to bring NBCUniversal movies and TV shows to JioCinema in India, and plans to make the content exclusive to paying subscribers  —  JioCinema, the affordable on-demand video streaming service rival to Netflix and Disney's Hotstar in India, will soon be the home for …

item.title: WPP、Nvidiaと提携し、生成AIを用いてクライアント向けに広告を大規模に制作、これまで数週間かかっていたキャンペーンを数分で作成できるよう支援（Daniel Thomas/Financial Times)
item.description:
Daniel Thomas / Financial Times:
WPP partners with Nvidia to produce ads at scale for its clients using generative AI, helping create campaigns in minutes that would previously have taken weeks  —  Technology platform will drastically speed up production of bespoke content for clients  —  WPP, one of the world's largest …

item.title: The MessengerのChief Growth OfficerであるNeetzan Zimmermanは、オンラインメディアのミームハッピーな黎明期のスターであり、古いブロゴスフィアの長所を取り戻そうとしている（Ben Smith/Semafor)
item.description:
Ben Smith / Semafor:
The Messenger Chief Growth Officer Neetzan Zimmerman, a star of online media's meme-happy early days, is trying to recapture the best of the old blogosphere  —  The News  —  Months before the launch of The Messenger's news website earlier in May, its newly minted Chief Growth Officer …

item.title: 2007年のWGAのストライキに比べ、他の組合からの連帯が強まり、作家がすでに完成した脚本でスタジオ制作を妨害するのに役立っている（New York Times)
item.description:
New York Times:
Greater solidarity from other unions compared to the 2007 WGA strike is helping writers disrupt studio productions with already finished scripts  —  Workers from other unions have shown solidarity with the strikers, catching entertainment companies off guard.  —  Nicole Sperling reported from Los Angeles in the early-morning dark.

item.title: サクセションの制作者が番組の原点を振り返り、ルパート・マードック、サムナー・レッドストーン、ロバート・マクスウェルがローガン・ロイの「聖なる三位一体のモデル」として活躍したと語る（Jesse Armstrong/The Guardian）。
item.description:
Jesse Armstrong / The Guardian:
Succession's creator recalls the show's origin and says Rupert Murdoch, Sumner Redstone, and Robert Maxwell served as the “holy trinity of models” for Logan Roy  —  It has been the TV drama of our time - a brutal, hilarious unpicking of how power works.

item.title: 米国、ブラジル、メキシコ、インドなどで成長戦略の要となったF1のD2C放送商品「F1 TV」に迫る（Samuel Agini/Financial Times）。
item.description:
Samuel Agini / Financial Times:
A look at Formula One's D2C broadcast product F1 TV, which has become a key component of the sport's growth strategy in the US, Brazil, Mexico, India, and more  —  Traditional broadcasters have helped steer fans towards the motorsport's own subscription apps, F1 TV and F1 TV Pro
